choices: She was captured and forced to wear them
1.content: Why is she in diapers.
1.title: The first choice of many.

13.title: She was captured and forced to wear them

152.content:
Tigress's eyes slowly start to open reveling the ceiling of her room. She slowly sat up "nightmare..again" she muttered to herself. The past several nights the master had been plagued by terrible dreams she could have handled the dreams just fine but unfortunately they brought another problem.

She thorugh off the covers to revile a large dark spot on the front off her pants and the familiar smell of urine. "Great just great. She said in a irritated tone. She began the familiar process of dealing with a wet bed. She stripped her clothes off and tossed them into a basket she kept for just that and did the same with her sheets. She warped a towel around herself grabbed a set of clothes and was about to go to the showers when...
152.title: She wets the bed.

info.brief_description: Master Tigress from Kung Fu Panda , ends up in diapers how and why is up to you.
info.description: First things first, why is the mighty worrier padded?
